translation.en: MARV: Metal screams.
Something hits me square in the chest.
translation.zh: 有什么东西正中我的胸膛

translation.en: There's no up or down.
I don't weigh a thing.
I don't remember a thing.
(SIGHS) This doesn't look good at all.
I've gone and done something again.
Wish I could remember what.
How did I get here?
What have I done? And why?
translation.zh: 我做了些什么？还有为什么？

translation.en: I must've forgotten my medicine.
I've got a condition.
It's bad to forget your medicine when you've got a condition.
translation.zh: 状况不好又忘记吃药 是一件很槽糕的事

translation.en: Caught myself a bullet.
The wound's fresh. Maybe an hour old.
translation.zh: 伤口还很新 也许是一小时前？

translation.en: I can't remember how I got it.
For the life of me, I can't remember.
The projects.
Ugly as ever.
What the hell am I doing here?
translation.zh: 我他妈到底在这里干什么？

translation.en: Put the pieces together.
Remember.
It's Saturday,
so I must've started the night at Kadie's joint.
translation.zh: 所以我一定是在凯蒂的酒馆 开始夜生活

translation.en: Just another Saturday night.
Me and all the other losers like me,
translation.zh: 我和其他所有和我一样的废柴

translation.en: sucking back the sauce and drooling like fools over Nancy.
translation.zh: 喝着小酒 像傻子一样对着南希垂涎三尺

translation.en: I was in a mood.
Even watching Nancy couldn't cheer me up.
translation.zh: 南希表演也没能让我打起精神

translation.en: I get that way sometimes.
Empty in the gut,
hollow in that lonely place.
And wishing I had an excuse to break somebody's face.
translation.zh: 希望找个理由打烂某人的脸

translation.en: It was just another Saturday night.
translation.zh: 就是个普通的周六夜晚

translation.en: I was wondering what I was gonna do with myself,
when I smelled something awful.
translation.zh: 我闻到了一股难闻的气味

translation.en: Burning hair.
Burning meat.
Like these poor old winos didn't have it bad enough already.
translation.zh: 好像这可怜的老家伙还不够惨一样

translation.en: Damn frat boys.
Damn rich, spoiled brats.
translation.zh: 该死的、有钱的被宠坏的孩子

translation.en: Leave him be.
Crawl back into your bottle, Bernini boy.
translation.zh: 爬回去喝你的酒吧 伯尼尼男孩

translation.en: Why'd he call me Bernie?
At least I know they're bad guys.
translation.zh: 至少我知道他们是坏人

translation.en: Nothing wrong with killing the bunch of them.
translation.zh: 杀几个这种人没什么错

translation.en: Hell, it's practically my civic duty.
Who were these wimpy little twits?
translation.zh: 这些蛀虫似的小白痴是谁？

translation.en: I hate these guys.
God, this really hurts.
They made a run for it. I did what any good citizen would do.
translation.zh: 他们逃了 我做了每一个好市民都会做的事

translation.en: -(SIRENS WAILING) -Aw, hell.
What the hell?
What the hell?
What the hell?
That's when I got my idea.
translation.zh: 就是那时我想到这个主意

translation.en: If they got back to their university out in Sacred Oaks,
translation.zh: 要是他们逃回了橡树区的大学

translation.en: I'd never catch them.
translation.zh: 我就再也抓不到他们了

translation.en: I banged them around like a hockey puck.
Cut them off at every turn.
I left them no choice but to head over the hill to the projects.
translation.zh: 我让他们别无选择只能爬坡 开进贫民区

translation.en: I could just turn my back and leave them here.
translation.zh: 我就可以转身离开 把他们留在那里

translation.en: My old neighbours would take care of them but good.
translation.zh: 我的老邻居们会好好招待他们

translation.en: But hell,
why should they have all the fun?
translation.zh: 他们凭什么享受全部的快乐？

translation.en: The projects.
I was born here.
My old neighbourhood.
BUZZ: Damn.
He's a dead man.
I'm telling you, I'm one bitch of a good shot and he's a dead man.
translation.zh: 我告诉你 我好好开一枪 他就死了

translation.en: My old neighbours.
They let me know they're watching.
translation.zh: 他们让我知道他们正旁观着

translation.en: I remind them who I am.
I tell them what to do.
BUZZ: No! No, please!
translation.zh: 不 不要 求求你！

translation.en: Please, I've got money. I've got a trust fund. I can pay.
translation.zh: 拜托 我有钱 我有信托基金 我可以给你钱

translation.en: You'll pay.
Before you shot me, you called me Bernie. Why'd you call me Bernie?
translation.zh: 在你开枪打我之前 你叫我伯尼 你为什么叫我伯尼？

translation.en: Bernini.
It's a brand name. That coat you're wearing.
translation.zh: 是一个品牌名 你穿的外套

translation.en: It's a Bernini.
Thanks for clearing that up, kid.
translation.zh: 孩子 谢谢你说清楚

translation.en: Knife!
Bernini, huh?
And one fine coat it is.
Somebody must've spent a fortune on it.
translation.zh: 有人一定为它花了不少钱

translation.en: I wonder who.
And while I'm at it...
Where the heck did I get these gloves?
I can't remember for the life of me.
Poker.
Savage power in gentlemen's hands.
(CHUCKLES) It's a good game.
Now...
Who wants to play?
JOHNNY: Sin City's where you go in with your eyes open,
translation.zh: 去罪恶之城一定要睁大双眼

translation.en: or you don't come out at all.
But a city's like a woman or a casino,
translation.zh: 但像个美女或赌场的城市

translation.en: somebody's gonna win.
And it's gonna be me.
It's the kind of place your father doesn't wanna talk about.
translation.zh: 这是父亲不愿提起的地方

translation.en: Though where I come from,
a father is a thing no one seems to be able to find.
translation.zh: 父亲似乎是没人能找到的存在

translation.en: I was feeling lucky.
I'd won money in joints all over town and I'd finally made it to Kadie's,
translation.zh: 我在全城的酒馆里都赢了钱 最后终于来到了凯蒂这里

translation.en: where the real score is.
MAN: What happened to the show?
How's tricks, stranger?
-Heads or tails? -Heads.
That's a trick.
That won't get you anywhere. (CHUCKLES)
Follow the shiny object.
-Where'd you come from, handsome? -Do me a favour and blow on this.
translation.zh: 你是从哪儿来的 帅哥？ 帮我个忙 朝这个吹口气

translation.en: -Does Lady Luck have a name? -Marcie.
translation.zh: 这位幸运女士有名字吗？ 玛茜

translation.en: Lucky man.
Every time, ma'am. Now, where's the real action?
translation.zh: 每一次都是如此 女士 真正的赌桌在哪？

translation.en: Baby, you don't wanna know.
translation.zh: 宝贝 你不会想知道的

translation.en: I do wanna know.
Whatever you say, boss.
Back of the bar. It's your funeral. They'll eat you alive back there.
translation.zh: 吧台后面 就是你的葬礼 他们会把你生吞活剥了

translation.en: I'm a pretty tough chew. Come on.
Would you kiss it this time?
Oh, my God!
-Hey there, Marcie. -Yeah?
-You wanna go make some real money? -Mmm-hmm, yeah.
translation.zh: -你想赚点大钱吗？ -唔 当然

translation.en: MAN: I'll check.
I'll bet a hundred.
Good night.
I'll play.
MAN: I'll fold.
Who's the slicker?
translation.zh: 这个油头滑脑的人是谁？

translation.en: I busted this one for craps over at Josie's once.
translation.zh: 我在乔茜那抓过他一次

translation.en: He paid up. He's okay.
Whatever you do, kid, don't win too much.
translation.zh: 不管你怎么玩 小子 别赢太多

translation.en: -I never lose. -(ALL LAUGHING)
-What's with bringing a frail in here? -This is my good luck charm.
translation.zh: 带美丽的女士来是什么意思？ 她是我的幸运女神

translation.en: Besides, I'm heading to make a pretty nice dime tonight.
translation.zh: 此外我今晚已经大赢了一大笔

translation.en: Gotta have someone to spend it on, right?
translation.zh: 得有人来花钱 不是吗？

translation.en: Sylvio, let our young friend here do the honours, huh?
translation.zh: 西尔维奥 让这位年轻的朋友来吧 好吗？

translation.en: JOHNNY: Cut. ROARK: Mmm. (CHUCKLES)
This boy's good.
CROWD: (CHANTING) Nancy! Nancy! Nancy!
translation.zh: 南希 南希 南希

translation.en: Nancy! Nancy! Nancy!
translation.zh: 南希 南希 南希

translation.en: And the dealer will take two.
-ABDUL: One hand in. -I'll play.
MAN: I'm out.
SYLVIO: Yeah, me too.
-ABDUL: I fold. -I'm done.
How dumb are you feeling now, boy?
Pretty dumb.
(CROWD CHANTING IN DISTANCE) Nancy, Nancy, Nancy!
translation.zh: 南希 南希 南希

translation.en: Well, Senator, I'm ready for your worst.
translation.zh: 参议员 我等着你下狠手

translation.en: Boy, you don't even wanna dream about my worst.
translation.zh: 小子 你连做梦都不会这样想的

translation.en: No, I don't imagine I do.
So why don't I just flatten your ass right now and we can call it a night?
translation.zh: 所以不如现在就来 然后结束今晚？

translation.en: Sure. This is a fair game, played by honourable men.
translation.zh: 好 这是正直绅士之间公平的游戏

translation.en: I'm gonna raise you 300.
Easy, kid.
You got any idea what you're up against?
translation.zh: 你知不知道自己惹的是谁？

translation.en: Looks to me like I'm up against a man.
You're up against a Roark.
Yeah, I was born here, Senator. I know who you are.
translation.zh: 我在这里出生 参议员 我知道你是谁

translation.en: We all die here sooner or later.
translation.zh: 我们迟早都会在这里死去

translation.en: I'm gonna raise you another 500.
(LAUGHS) I like this kid.
I like him a lot.
I'm gonna call you.
You won't be needing anything for cab fare, will you?
translation.zh: 你也不需要打车钱 是吧？

translation.en: Now that's as fine a hand as you'll ever have, friend.
translation.zh: 最好的一手牌 朋友

translation.en: You just keep in mind what hands are made out of.
translation.zh: 你可记住了手是什么做的

translation.en: Will do.
Hey.
Get your ass outta here. Run like hell, you might still have a chance.
translation.zh: 滚出去 快点逃 你可能还有点机会

translation.en: Oh, I can't miss tomorrow night's game.
translation.zh: 我不能错过明晚的牌局

translation.en: Not any more than you can, Officer.
Besides, I already promised Marcie a night on the town.
translation.zh: 此外 我承诺了玛茜一个晚上

translation.en: I can't protect you.
Then why are you a cop?
Where we going, Johnny?
translation.zh: 我们要去哪里 钱宁？

translation.en: Everywhere.
HARTIGAN: One of these days she'll pull the trigger,
translation.zh: 总有一天她会扣下扳机

translation.en: and then there's nothing I can do.
translation.zh: 到那时我就无能为力了

translation.en: There's nothing I can do now.
And all I can do is ask you...
...is don't.
Don't avenge me, Nancy.
translation.zh: 不要为我报仇 南希

translation.en: It'll be the death of you.
I can't help.
I can't watch.
Death is just like life in Sin City.
translation.zh: 在罪恶之城 死亡和生存无异

translation.en: There's nothing you can do.
And love doesn't conquer anything at all.
Good luck, Nancy.
Live while you're alive.
Just try, sweetheart.
JOHNNY: We make Sin City history.
translation.zh: 我们创造了罪恶之城的历史

translation.en: Hit every hot spot in town.
translation.zh: 逛了城里的每个热门景点

translation.en: I blow through almost as much cash as I make at the tables.
translation.zh: 赌桌上赢来的钱基本都花光了

translation.en: The trouble starts when I try to use my credit cards.
translation.zh: 我试着使用信用卡时 麻烦就开始了

translation.en: I'm sure there must be some mistake. We'd be happy to extend you a line of credit.
translation.zh: 我相信一定是出了什么问题 我们很乐意为您提高信用卡额度

translation.en: How can all of them go bad on the same night?
translation.zh: 怎么可能在同一晚都不能用了？

translation.en: It's not like you don't have cash.
That's not the point. Come on.
We gotta get you home.
Something comes up behind us.
Smells all wrong.
This will slow us down.
You get to the side, Marcie. I gotta break some bones.
translation.zh: 你到一边去 玛茜 我要去打断某些人的骨头了

translation.en: What are you talking about, you silly?
You just stay right there.
Gentlemen, listen, I think I know what this is about,
translation.zh: 先生们 听着 我想我知道这是怎么回事

translation.en: and I want you to know, you'll have no resistance from me.
translation.zh: 我希望你们明白 我不会反抗

translation.en: That blackjack you've got in your hand could split somebody's skull open.
translation.zh: 你手上拿着的那根短木棒 能敲碎别人的脑袋

translation.en: -What the hell was that all about? -You stay out of sight now.
You'll be safe in Old Town.
Meet me at the Three Sheets Hotel. Room 166.
translation.zh: 去三床酒店跟我汇合 166号房

translation.en: (MUMBLES IN CONFUSION)
Let's get this over with.
Don't enjoy it too much, fellas.
You made a fool of me, boy.
translation.zh: 你让我出丑了 孩子

translation.en: Right in front of the wrong people.
You took your chances like we all did. And you lost.
translation.zh: 所有人的机会都是平等的 而你输了

translation.en: Do you have any idea how easy I kill little snots like you?
translation.zh: 你知道我要弄死 像你这样的小杂碎有多容易吗？

translation.en: Now, let's see about that winning hand.
translation.zh: 现在来看看那胜利之手吧

translation.en: Powerful men watch what happens at that table.
translation.zh: 权贵们都看见了 那张牌桌上发生的事情

translation.en: I need them to know the price of defiance.
translation.zh: 我要让他们知道挑衅的代价

translation.en: Power is a fragile thing.
translation.zh: 权力是一种很脆弱的东西

translation.en: It tolerates no threat.
Defiance must be met with an example of the wages of defiance.
translation.zh: 挑衅者必须以身展示挑衅的代价

translation.en: You'd be smart to kill me now.
translation.zh: 你最好现在就把我杀了

translation.en: I'll do far worse than kill you, boy.
translation.zh: 我会让你比被杀死还惨 小子

translation.en: What you have encountered, boy, is power.
translation.zh: 孩子 你遇到的是权力

translation.en: Every time the wind blows cold and wet, that thing that was your hand
will clutch at your leg in arthritic agony.
translation.zh: 你的手和腿就会让你痛苦不已

translation.en: Whenever it rains, you'll remember me.
translation.zh: 只要一下雨 你就会想起我

translation.en: You'll remember me all the time...
My son.
Oh, yeah. I know who you are.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道你是谁

translation.en: I knew you were one of mine the minute I saw you.
translation.zh: 我一见到你 就知道你是我的孩子

translation.en: Family resemblance, my boy.
translation.zh: 家族相似性 我的孩子

translation.en: I don't give a damn. I only had one real son.
translation.zh: 我不在乎 我只有一个真正的儿子

translation.en: Ethan, may he rest in peace. And he could have been president.
translation.zh: 伊森 愿他安息 他本可能当上总统的

translation.en: Did you really think that I was gonna claim you?
JOHNNY: You beat me, Roark.
But when I get back,
it'll be a whole different game.
DWIGHT: It's another hot night. Dry and windless.
translation.zh: 是另一个炎热的夜晚 干燥无风

translation.en: The kind that makes people do sweaty, secret things.
translation.zh: 会让人做些容易出汗的秘密的事

translation.en: Things worth money to me.
JOEY: This is the last time, Sally. This has gotta be the last time.
translation.zh: 这是最后一次了 萨莉 这必须是最后一次

translation.en: -SALLY: You always say that. -I mean it this time.
translation.zh: 你总是这么说 这次我是认真的

translation.en: DWIGHT: She glides out of her coat like it was Christmas wrapping,
translation.zh: 她从外套中滑出来 像是圣诞礼物的包装纸

translation.en: playing it for all it's worth.
And it's worth plenty.
-JOEY: This is the end for us. -The end for us?
It's my wife. She's asking all kinds of questions.
translation.zh: 是我的妻子 她不停地问问题

translation.en: She suspects something. She'll sue and she'll get everything.
translation.zh: 她开始怀疑了 她会去告我 然后得到一切

translation.en: Everything!
Everything you've worked so hard for.
I work my butt off. I built my business up from out of nothing.
translation.zh: 我拼死拼活地工作 我白手起家开创了自己的事业

translation.en: Nothing.
Nobody appreciates you, do they, Joey? Not the way you deserve.
translation.zh: 没人感激你 是吗 乔伊？ 不是以你应得的方式

translation.en: JOEY: Nobody.
Not the employees, who would be out on the street if it wasn't for me.
translation.zh: 少了我就会睡大街的雇员 没有感激

translation.en: Not my wife, who I found on the street.
translation.zh: 我在街上发现的妻子没有

translation.en: -She lives in that mansion you bought her. -Wearing all those clothes that I got her!
translation.zh: 她住在你给她买的房子里 穿着我给她买的衣服！

translation.en: -With my money, my hard-earned money! -I think you're so strong.
translation.zh: 花着我的钱 我辛辛苦苦赚来的钱 我认为你很强

translation.en: You're damn right about that. But do I get any credit?
translation.zh: 这点你是对的 但我得到任何回报了吗？

translation.en: They just take and take and take!
One of these days I'm gonna fire the whole pack of them!
translation.zh: 总有一天我要把他们全开除了

translation.en: I'm gonna show them who's boss!
translation.zh: 我要让他们看看谁才是老大

translation.en: Show me, Joey. Show me who's boss.
translation.zh: 让我看看 乔伊 看看谁才是老大

translation.en: Yeah. I'll show you. I'm gonna show you!
translation.zh: 是的 我会展示给你看

translation.en: JOEY: I'll show you who's boss!
translation.zh: 我要让你看看谁是老大

translation.en: DWIGHT: Then she's moaning and saying "boss" in time with his movements.
translation.zh: 于是她开始呻吟 并随着他的动作叫着“老大”

translation.en: -(JOEY GRUNTING) -SALLY: Boss! Boss!
It's all over pretty quickly.
I get everything I need.
translation.zh: 我得到了我需要的一切

translation.en: The sad thing is, some of the compositions are pretty good.
translation.zh: 可惜的是 有些作品还真不错

translation.en: (SIGHS) You made me feel like a woman.
I know it sounds corny, but it's true.
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很老套但是真的

translation.en: I love you, baby.
You know I love you. Even when you lie to me.
translation.zh: 你知道我是爱你的 即便你是在骗我

translation.en: My wrist hurts, Joey.
translation.zh: 我的手腕会疼 乔伊

translation.en: You think you could get the key? It's just in my purse.
translation.zh: 你以为你可以拿到钥匙？ 它在我的包里

translation.en: You don't have any idea how much I've sacrificed.
translation.zh: 你不知道我牺牲了多少

translation.en: What are you doing, Joey?
It's tearing me up, how much I love you and what I gotta do.
translation.zh: 我对你的爱和我必须要做的事 让我心碎

translation.en: But I've worked too hard.
JOEY: And Gloria will get everything.
translation.zh: 而格洛丽亚将夺走一切

translation.en: And I can't let that happen.
I don't have a choice. It's all her fault.
translation.zh: 我别无选择 都是她的错

translation.en: Joey, please, I... I won't tell anyone, I swear to God.
translation.zh: 乔伊 求你 我… 我不会告诉任何人 我发誓

translation.en: I know you won't wanna talk. I know that. But you're only human.
translation.zh: 我知道你不会说 我知道 但你只是个普通人

translation.en: Oh, my aching back.
Gloria's gonna find out about you if she doesn't know already,
translation.zh: 格洛丽亚会发现你的存在 无论她现在是否知道

translation.en: and she's gonna offer you a lot of money.
translation.zh: 然后她会给你一大笔钱

translation.en: My money! And she's gonna give it to you to bring me down!
translation.zh: 我的钱！她会给你然后整垮我！

translation.en: Then I'll go away!
Who's gonna pay for the ticket? The ticket and God knows what else?
translation.zh: 谁给你路费？ 路费还有天知道别的东西

translation.en: Then the apartment? The clothes? The car?
You're gonna suck me dry and you'll never, ever stop!
translation.zh: 你会榨干我 永不停止

translation.en: No! Please! No!
-Kill him! Kill him! Kill him! -(GRUNTS)
Nobody's killing anybody. Not while I'm around.
translation.zh: 没人要杀人 我在场就不可以

translation.en: Then can I have a ride?
I grab the key and uncuff her.
translation.zh: 我取出钥匙 帮她解开了手铐

translation.en: She gives him a good-bye that'll still hurt like hell when he comes to.
translation.zh: 她给了他一次再见 让他每每想起都会隐隐作痛

translation.en: I leave the slob handcuffed to the bed for housekeeping to find.
translation.zh: 我把这小子铐在了床尾 等着服务员发现他

translation.en: I take Redondo over the hill toward Old Town.
translation.zh: 我带着她翻山越岭 一路驶向了老城

translation.en: Thanks for my life, man.
Sally blends into the sea of flesh that is Old Town.
translation.zh: 萨莉消失在老城的人群中

translation.en: They all come back,
the damn Old Town memories.
Drunken mornings and sweaty sex and stupid, bloody brawls.
translation.zh: 烂醉的清晨 纵欲的夜晚 还有可笑的 血腥的战斗

translation.en: And that thing I did. You can't just pick and choose.
translation.zh: 还有我做过的事 生活不是简单的选择题

translation.en: You can't take the good without the bad.
translation.zh: 不能只选好的而避开坏的 （旅馆 性爱宫殿）

translation.en: Not once you let the monster out. I can't let it out.
translation.zh: 你一次都不行把怪物放出来 我不能放它出来

translation.en: Never again.
I drive 10 blocks out of my way and stop for gas I don't need,
translation.zh: 我把车开到了十个街区以外 停车加了些不需要的油

translation.en: avoiding the worst of this job,
my employer,
the wife.
This one's got a lawyer to pay the tab, so it's easier.
translation.zh: 她雇了律师处理财务事宜 所以很简单

translation.en: Please leave by the servants' exit.
The Mustang shudders,
begging to cut loose and show what it can do.
translation.zh: 渴望脱缰后自由展现自己

translation.en: It wants to take me all the way.
I don't let it.
I think about all the ways I've screwed up
translation.zh: 我想着曾经搞砸的一切

translation.en: and what I'd give for one clear chance to wipe the slate clean.
translation.zh: 想着怎样才能有洗心革面的机会

translation.en: I'd give anything just to cut loose.
translation.zh: 我愿付出任何代价 只为挣脱束缚

translation.en: Just to feel the fire
one more time.
Never lose control.
Not for a second.
Never let the monster out.
Remember when you did.
Remember what you did.
-Yeah? -Dwight, is that you?
translation.zh: 谁？ 德怀特 是你吗？

translation.en: -Ava. -I'm sorry to call.
I know I've got no right. But I need to see you.
translation.zh: 我知道我没这个权力 但我需要见你

translation.en: Tonight.
Please, Dwight. Don't hang up. Please.
translation.zh: 求你了 德怀特 别挂电话 好吗？

translation.en: DWIGHT: She keeps talking. Like an idiot, I keep listening.
translation.zh: 她一直说着 我像个傻瓜一样一直听着

translation.en: Ava. Damn.
I should tell her to go to hell.
translation.zh: （凯蒂俱乐部佩科斯） 我应该让她去死

translation.en: Instead I show up 20 minutes early.
What the hell could she want with me now?
translation.zh: 她现在又想找我做什么？

translation.en: You can't drive two blocks in Sin City without coming across a saloon.
translation.zh: 在罪恶之城里 开车两个街区就会有一家沙龙

translation.en: The bad kind.
Why here, Ava?
translation.zh: 为什么在这里 艾娃？

translation.en: With you, everything always had to be first class.
translation.zh: 和你一起 一切都得是最好的

translation.en: And when I couldn't foot the bill,
you sure as hell found somebody who could.
translation.zh: 你总能另找一个付得起钱的人

translation.en: I order up a ginger ale and stare at it for the better part of an hour.
translation.zh: 我叫了杯姜汁啤酒 盯了将近半小时

translation.en: She's late, like she always was.
translation.zh: 她迟到了 一如既往

translation.en: And like always...
she's worth the wait.
Dwight.
How long has it been?
Four years?
Yeah, sounds about right.
Have a seat.
So many times I've wanted to call you.
I found myself thinking about you.
Constantly.
I've got places to go. How about you just tell me what you want?
translation.zh: -一直都是 -我还有事 不如直说你想要什么？

translation.en: Don't be cold. I don't think I could stand that right now.
translation.zh: 别这么冷淡 我现在承受不了

translation.en: I must still mean something to you.
-You came here, you must still care. -Sure.
translation.zh: 你来了 所以你一定还在乎我 当然

translation.en: You called and I came running.
translation.zh: 你打了电话 所以我跑着过来了

translation.en: You've still got that much of a hold on me. Maybe you always will.
translation.zh: 你还是让我无法抗拒 也许永远都抗拒不了

translation.en: But I got no reason at all to be nice to you.
translation.zh: 但这不代表我会给你好脸色看

translation.en: -I guess I deserve that. -Let's not screw around.
translation.zh: 我猜是我活该 别兜圈子了

translation.en: I'm here. I'm listening.
Just tell me what the hell it is you want.
translation.zh: 告诉我你到底想要怎样

translation.en: There's only one thing I want from you,
and I want it so desperately I could scream.
translation.zh: 我是如此迫切地想要它

translation.en: I want you to forgive me.
So you've got a conscience, after all.
Fine. I forgive you. You got your wish.
translation.zh: 好 我原谅你 你的愿望实现了

translation.en: Now go home. Sleep tight.
translation.zh: 现在回家吧 安心睡个好觉

translation.en: You're right about me.
I'm a selfish slut who threw away the only man she ever loved.
translation.zh: 我是个自私的婊子 抛弃了唯一的挚爱

translation.en: -But I was wrong. -Good one.
I was born at night, but it wasn't last night.
translation.zh: 我是晚上出生的 但不是昨晚

translation.en: I'm in hell, Dwight. It's worse than you can imagine.
translation.zh: 我很难过 德怀特 比你想得更难过

translation.en: You made your bed. Sleep in it.
-Forgive me, darling, I beg you. -No.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 求你了 原谅我 -不！

translation.en: -I love you. -No.
No!
You do that again, I swear to hell I'll kill you.
translation.zh: 你再这样 我发誓会杀了你

translation.en: If you can't forgive me then please remember me.
translation.zh: 如果你无法原谅我 那请你记住我

translation.en: They say you really never die as long as somebody remembers you.
translation.zh: 据说只要有人记得 你就不会真正死去

translation.en: What the devil are you talking about?
Mrs Lord...
The weather is inclement, the neighbourhood is bad
translation.zh: 天气回凉了 附近治安也不好

translation.en: and your present company...is low.
translation.zh: 而且您身边这位…很掉档次

translation.en: You're due at home, Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 您该回家了 洛德夫人

translation.en: I'd say that's up to Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 我想这决定权在洛德夫人

translation.en: This is none of your concern, sir.
translation.zh: 这事和你没关系 先生

translation.en: Any physical contest between us would have one outcome.
translation.zh: 要是发生肢体冲突 只会有一种结果

translation.en: Hey, buddy.
Is that dickhead giving you a hard time?
You want me to break him down for you?
I ain't got nothing going on tonight.
That would be an interesting contest.
It's not his fight.
Never mind, Dwight. It's too late. I'll go with him.
translation.zh: 别在意 德怀特 反正也晚了 我跟他走

translation.en: Too late for what, Ava?
For everything.
Just remember me, my love.
translation.zh: 一定要记住我 亲爱的

translation.en: AVA: Remember me.
You will have business tonight, Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 今晚您有事要忙了 洛德夫人

translation.en: Unpleasant business.
AVA: I don't care any more.
DWIGHT: The night air hasn't gotten any colder.
It just feels that way.
Buddy, I don't mean to poke my nose where it don't belong, but...
translation.zh: 伙计 我不想插手 但是…

translation.en: That there is a dame to kill for.
translation.zh: 这是一个值得为之杀戮的女人

translation.en: Ava.
Damn!
Night turns to day and then it's night again
and there's nowhere to hide.
She isn't worth a moment's thought and I can't get her out of my head.
translation.zh: 她根本不值得丝毫的想念 可我却无法将她从我脑中抹去

translation.en: What am I doing smoking?
Where did I get these cigarettes?
It's Ava making you crazy...
All over again.
Never let the monster out.
Shake her off.
Whatever she's in for, she deserves it.
translation.zh: 不管她遭遇了什么 都是咎由自取

translation.en: But I have to know what's wrong.
translation.zh: 可我必须知道是怎么回事

translation.en: It's a couple hours' drive out to Sacred Oaks.
translation.zh: 到橡树区只有几小时车程

translation.en: It shouldn't take too much effort to get to the bottom of this.
translation.zh: 费不了多大劲就能弄清楚

translation.en: Just a simple job of breaking and entering,
translation.zh: 不过是简单地破门而入

translation.en: punishable by up to five years in the slammer, even if I don't kill anybody.
translation.zh: 即使我没有杀人 也会被判入狱五年

translation.en: I wind up seeing a lot more of Ava than I bargained for.
translation.zh: 我最后见到的艾娃 比我预想的要更好

translation.en: And she seems perfectly goddamned fine.
Not roughed up,
just the rich man's wife she always intended to be.
translation.zh: 就是个她一直想成为的富太太

translation.en: I'm a damned fool.
Freeze, pervert.
Let me through, Manute.
I'm sorry, Dwight.
An atom bomb goes off between my legs.
translation.zh: 一颗原子弹在我两腿之间爆炸了

translation.en: A freight train barrels into my jaw.
I've taken a beating before, but never like this.
translation.zh: 我被打过 但从未像这样

translation.en: Never like this.
The sounds go wet. Maybe he keeps hitting me.
translation.zh: 声音模糊了 也许他一直在打我

translation.en: I don't know. I'm gone.
translation.zh: 我不知道 我晕倒了

translation.en: Gone to that place where there is no pain or thought.
translation.zh: 去了没有知觉和痛觉的地方

translation.en: I wake up in mid-air.
The pavement rushes up to give me a big, sloppy kiss.
DWIGHT: I'll be damned. Door-to-door service.
Then I spot my Mustang,
which makes no sense.
Why would they return my car?
translation.zh: 他们怎么会把我的车还回来？

translation.en: Get outta here.
No.
Put your clothes back on and get outta here. Now.
translation.zh: 穿上衣服 立马走人

translation.en: No.
You had your chance.
I would have stayed away, but you came for me.
translation.zh: 我本来可以置之不理的 但你来找我了

translation.en: You still want me.
And I'm yours. Now.
Tonight.
Get outta my life once and for all,
or I'll bash your teeth in.
If you can't love me,
hate me.
If you can't forgive me, punish me.
translation.zh: 如果你无法原谅我 那就惩罚我吧

translation.en: Make me hurt like I've hurt you.
translation.zh: 伤害我 就像我伤害你那样

translation.en: I call her every foul name there is.
translation.zh: 我用各种肮脏的话语骂她

translation.en: She makes my name sound like music,
translation.zh: 她却像歌唱一般呼唤我的名字

translation.en: like a chant to some dark god.
She's slippery with sweat.
Before long my hatred is spent,
translation.zh: 不久 我的仇恨便消散了

translation.en: but she won't let go.
She kisses me and coaxes me,
and the fire grows again.
I say all the things I swore I'd never say again.
translation.zh: 我说了些我发誓不再说的话

translation.en: She owns me.
Body and soul.
Tell me everything.
Manute, the man who beat you,
translation.zh: 马努特 打你的那个人

translation.en: he's a specialist in inflicting pain.
Hideous pain, in all the places you just gave me joy.
translation.zh: 可怕的痛苦 在所有你给我快乐的地方

translation.en: That's sick.
That's crazy.
Damien, my husband,
he talks and talks and watches.
It's worse each time.
He's getting closer to his final, sick climax.
translation.zh: 这能让他得到他要的变态高潮

translation.en: He says I'll be very ugly before I die.
translation.zh: 他还说会让我死得很难看

translation.en: Baby, you're not gonna die.
You're coming with me.
(CHUCKLES) It's hopeless.
He lets me run away. Even laughs about it.
translation.zh: 他会让我逃跑 甚至还会嘲笑

translation.en: He doesn't care where I go, what I do.
translation.zh: 他不在乎我去哪里 做什么

translation.en: He knows Manute will always find me.
translation.zh: 他知道马努特总会找到我

translation.en: Isn't that right, Manute?
Madam... Mr Lord will require that you be disciplined.
translation.zh: 夫人…洛德先生希望你能自重

translation.en: No, Dwight. Don't fight him!
translation.zh: 不 德怀特 别跟他动手

translation.en: He'll kill you. He's not human.
translation.zh: 他会杀了你 他不是一般人

translation.en: I punch a vault door. It doesn't fall down, so I punch it again.
translation.zh: 我用尽力气揍他 可他纹丝不动 于是我又补了一拳

translation.en: A wrecking ball hits me square in the chest.
translation.zh: 一记千斤重拳砸在了我的胸口

translation.en: Mrs Lord, your coat.
translation.zh: 洛德夫人 穿上衣服

translation.en: We have an appointment.
They can't take her away from me.
translation.zh: 他们休想从我身边夺走她

translation.en: Not this time.
I know exactly what to do.
I know exactly where to go.
Now here's a girl with protection.
translation.zh: 这里有个倍受保护的女孩

translation.en: She may be showing off everything she's got in a ratty dive full of horny drunks,
translation.zh: 虽然平日在那些淫荡醉鬼面前 可能会搔首弄姿

translation.en: but Nancy's the safest gal in the world.
translation.zh: 但南希是世上最安全的女孩

translation.en: Make a grab for Nancy, and you're up against 300 pounds of iron
translation.zh: 敢碰南希一下 你要迎接的就是

translation.en: that goes by the name of Marv.
Marv.
Dwight.
I didn't even see you there.
translation.zh: 我甚至没看见你在那儿

translation.en: -What can I do you for? -I need your help.
translation.zh: 我能为你做什么？ 我需要你的帮助

translation.en: It's bad. It means going up against a lot of guns.
translation.zh: 很糟糕 可能会面对很多枪口

translation.en: Count me in.
I could use a change of pace.
We finish off the bottle, letting its liquid darkness fill us both.
translation.zh: 我们喝光了酒 让这流动的黑暗填满了内心

translation.en: When I'm sure he's had enough to make him good and dangerous,
translation.zh: 当我确定他已喝足了酒 绝对危险的时候

translation.en: I tell him about Ava and his eyes go killer red.
translation.zh: 我告诉了他艾娃的事 他血红的双眼弥漫着杀气

translation.en: I know he's willing to die for me, if that's what it takes.
translation.zh: 我知道有必要的话 他会为我拼上性命

translation.en: So I'm using him. So what?
translation.zh: 所以我是在利用他 那又怎么样？

translation.en: So he breaks the faces I want him to break instead of somebody else's.
translation.zh: 他会替我打想打的人 而不是其他人

translation.en: So he helps me get Ava back in my arms again
translation.zh: 他能让艾娃重回我的怀抱

translation.en: instead of sleeping it off in a flophouse or a gutter.
translation.zh: 而不是睡在廉价旅馆或排水沟里

translation.en: His life isn't worth a damn, anyway.
translation.zh: 反正他的命也无关紧要

translation.en: If I don't get him killed, the world will. One way or another.
translation.zh: 就算我不想要他死 这个世界也会 总是会发生的

translation.en: I want you to leave that thing in the car.
translation.zh: 我想你把那东西放在车上

translation.en: Nobody's getting killed tonight.
Aw, come on, Dwight. You ain't no fun at all.
translation.zh: 噢 拜托 德怀特 这样就不好玩了

translation.en: DWIGHT: We split up at the gate.
It doesn't take Marv long to get their attention.
translation.zh: 很快马尔夫就引起了他们的注意

translation.en: You've trespassed on hallowed ground.
You're the slug that hurt my friend, huh?
translation.zh: 就是你这个混球让我朋友难堪吗？

translation.en: Shall we?
Haven't had my hand around one of these in days.
translation.zh: 我已经好几天没碰过这些东西了

translation.en: I'll find the truth about Ava and what's happening to her now.
translation.zh: 我会查清艾娃的事 以及她现在是怎么样

translation.en: He'll tell me.
I'll get it out of him.
Damien Lord.
Where is she?
What have you done with her?
Have you come to take her away from all this? (CHUCKLES)
translation.zh: 你是来救她离开这些的吗？

translation.en: And what is "all this", in her present stories?
translation.zh: 以及在她的故事里 是如何描述这些的？

translation.en: I haven't the slightest notion what nonsense my wife has told you.
translation.zh: 我不清楚我的妻子对你说了什么

translation.en: Nor do I care.
It's all lies.
Stay away from the desk.
The woman is pathological.
You've been deceived.
What did it feel like?
What?
Murdering an innocent man.
I just want to know what it felt like.
translation.zh: 我只是想知道那是什么感觉

translation.en: It must have been beautiful.
What are you talking about, innocence?
I knew I could count on you.
Sex always made you stupid, ready to believe anything.
translation.zh: 性爱总会让你犯蠢 轻易相信任何事

translation.en: You've just made me a very rich woman.
Do me one last favour, lover.
translation.zh: 最后帮我个忙吧 亲爱的

translation.en: Stay still long enough for me to blow your brains out.
translation.zh: 站在那儿别动 好让我一枪崩了你的头

translation.en: I'm not much of a shot.
-But I do my best. -Ava...
I planned it and you fell for it.
translation.zh: 我设了圈套而你跳了进来

translation.en: This is the last time I'm ever gonna need anything from a man.
translation.zh: 这将是我最后一次需要男人

translation.en: The last time I make my living on my back.
translation.zh: 最后一次出卖我的肉体

translation.en: Manute never hurt you?
He wouldn't dare.
-You're insane. -No, Dwight.
A crazy person would be anyone who believes me.
And that would be you.
If I kissed you now, Dwight,
translation.zh: 如果我现在吻你 德怀特

translation.en: would you still believe it was...love?
Ava.
Damn!
MARV: Hey, I handled that big slug just like I promised.
translation.zh: 我按承诺处理了那个大块头

translation.en: I didn't kill him, I didn't even cripple him.
translation.zh: 我没杀他 也没废了他

translation.en: Six months in traction, that's all, tops. I took an eye out of him, though.
translation.zh: 最多卧床六个月 不过我挖了他一只眼

translation.en: Listen, before you say anything,
translation.zh: 听着 在你说话之前

translation.en: I know I was supposed to take the 'Stang to make my getaway.
But when I saw this beauty here sitting there...
You know, and the keys in the ignition and everything,
translation.zh: 你知道 一切都已经准备好

translation.en: I couldn't pass up a chance to
take a drive in an honest-to-God Tucker.
translation.zh: 咱俩一起开车享受一把

translation.en: OFFICER: Pull over!
You know, they only made a couple dozen of these beauties.
translation.zh: 你知道 这种车一共也没生产几辆

translation.en: I saw a movie about it once.
translation.zh: 我看过一部有关它的电影

translation.en: Oh, here I am jabbering, and you're leaking all over the place.
translation.zh: 噢 我在这儿说了半天 你就在那泄漏了全部

translation.en: I'll get you to a guy I know.
translation.zh: 我带你去一个认识的人那里

translation.en: He's good with bullets and he don't ask no questions.
translation.zh: 他擅长处理枪伤 也不会问问题

translation.en: Get me to Old Town.
Let me level with you, pal. You ain't gonna make it to Old Town.
translation.zh: 说实话 伙计 你撑不到老城了

translation.en: DWIGHT: I'll make it.
I've got too much I've gotta do to let myself die.
translation.zh: 我还有很多事要做 死不了

translation.en: Old Town.
He left a lot of blood, Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 他流了很多血 洛德夫人

translation.en: He won't get far.
Now, you said you knew him.
The killer's name's Dwight.
Dwight McCarthy.
You knew him in what sense?
Why, the Biblical one.
translation.zh: 为什么 圣经那一种

translation.en: I'm sorry, Lieutenant.
You've been so very patient with me. Here we've barely met, and already I...
translation.zh: 您对我这么耐心 你我虽然素未谋面 但我…

translation.en: I feel I can trust you.
You can trust me.
We were together for a while a few years ago.
translation.zh: 几年前我们在一起过一段时间

translation.en: It went badly.
He went insane.
He started imagining things, accusing me of things.
translation.zh: 他开始幻想一些事情 胡乱指责我

translation.en: He followed me wherever I went.
Recently he broke into this very property.
translation.zh: 最近他还擅自闯进这栋房子

translation.en: He beat you?
When he drank.
He drank a lot.
-You stayed with this nutcase? -Never mind that.
translation.zh: -那你还跟这个疯子在一起？ -不用在意

translation.en: You'd be surprised how much a woman can take.
translation.zh: 女人的容忍度超乎你的预料

translation.en: You were terrified.
It was Damien who took me away.
He was so gentle and sure.
I suppose I'm a woman who needs protection.
translation.zh: 我想我是个需要倍保护的女人

translation.en: He made me feel safe.
But then... Dwight, he found me somehow.
translation.zh: 然而…德怀特 他还是找到了我

translation.en: He started calling me late at night, making awful threats.
translation.zh: 他在深夜给我打恐吓电话

translation.en: (SOBBING) And now Damien's dead and I'm alone.
translation.zh: 现在达米安死了 而我孤身一人

translation.en: Oh, please, Lieutenant!
Call me Mort.
Nothing like a widow in need of comfort.
translation.zh: 没什么比得上需要安慰的寡妇

translation.en: I got a stiffy just watching. Man, she is primed.
translation.zh: 光是看着就让人变傻了 她真有韵味

translation.en: -Just drop it, Bob. -You don't pass up a chance like that.
translation.zh: -鲍勃 把它放下 -不要错过好机会

translation.en: What's the point of being a Sin City cop if you don't get the perks?
translation.zh: 要是没有点好处 在罪恶之城当警察还有什么意思？

translation.en: I'm a married man, Bob.
translation.zh: 我们是有妇之夫 鲍勃

translation.en: BOB: (LAUGHS) I don't care what you are. I mean, just take a look at that babe.
translation.zh: 我才不管你是什么 看看那个宝贝

translation.en: That's enough, Bob.
DWIGHT: This doesn't look good.
One squad car still chases us.
Must be a rookie driving.
His buddies should have told him the girls of Old Town have laws all their own.
translation.zh: 他的哥们儿应该告诉他 老城的姑娘们有自己的规矩

translation.en: And they don't take kindly to cops.
Old Town! (CHUCKLES) Oh, you're a genius, kid!
(GROANS)
MARV: Here we are, pal.
All of a sudden this doesn't look like the brightest idea you ever had.
translation.zh: 突然间 好像不怎么明智

translation.en: You have 10 seconds to tell us what you're doing bringing cops to Old Town.
translation.zh: 给你十秒钟 交代为什么把条子招来老城

translation.en: Here's the problem.
I don't fight girls.
Gail.
-It's me. -Dwight!
What have they done to you?
A corkscrew stabs me square in the chest...
...and twists.
Get Molly!
Get everybody.
It's about time.
-Hello? -Mrs Lord.
Lieutenant.
Mort.
-You're so kind to call. -I hope I didn't wake you.
translation.zh: -你能来电话真是太好了 -希望我没吵醒你

translation.en: No, I wasn't sleeping. I haven't slept at all.
translation.zh: 没 我没睡觉 我完全睡不着

translation.en: I'm jumping at every sound, just knowing he's still out there.
translation.zh: 想到他还逍遥法外 就让我坐立不安

translation.en: I guess I'm not a very strong person.
And me in this house, all alone.
translation.zh: 而且又孤身一人在这房子里

translation.en: You shouldn't be so hard on yourself, Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 别苛责自己 洛德夫人

translation.en: You're having a very understandable reaction.
translation.zh: 你的反应是可以理解的

translation.en: If there's anything at all I can do for you...
I know it's a bad thing to think of you the way I do.
It's...
...inconvenient.
But who ever loved, who loved not at first sight?
translation.zh: 但是坠入爱河的人 又有谁不是一见钟情呢？

translation.en: I've thought about you since I saw you.
translation.zh: 我自见面后就对你无法忘怀

translation.en: I'm thinking about you now.
Are you thinking about me?
Yes.
I hate myself for saying this, but,
translation.zh: 我讨厌这么说 但是

translation.en: I just don't know if I could bear to be alone tonight.
translation.zh: 但我不知道我能否忍受独自度过长夜

translation.en: DWIGHT: My heart beats. I take in the rich, burnt smell of coffee.
translation.zh: 我的心还在跳 我闻到了煮咖啡的香味

translation.en: Gail.
She's reason enough to open my eyes.
Can you hear me, Dwight?
translation.zh: 能听见我说话吗 德怀特？

translation.en: The cops want you bad, Dwight.
translation.zh: 条子们正在竭力找你 德怀特

translation.en: Really bad.
But don't worry.
We'll fix you up.
And when we do,
when you're all better...
I'll deck you for leaving in the first place.
translation.zh: 咱们再好好聊聊你离开的事

translation.en: I told you you'd be back.
I told you.
You belong here.
Jerk!
I thought there was another world out there.
translation.zh: 我以为外面还有另一个世界

translation.en: I thought I could be a part of it.
translation.zh: 我以为我可以成为它的一部分

translation.en: There's only Sin City.
-Molly said you're ready to leave. -No. I'm staying.
translation.zh: 莫莉说你准备走了 不 我要留下来

translation.en: Wrong answer. Miho?
DWIGHT: Deadly little Miho.
If she recognises me, she doesn't let it show.
translation.zh: 就算她认出了我 也不会表现出来

translation.en: Oh, you picked the wrong neighbourhood for your hideout.
translation.zh: 你真是选错了藏身之处

translation.en: -Alive or dead, you're leaving. -I'm staying.
translation.zh: -无论你是死是活 都必须离开 -我要留在这儿

translation.en: I don't think he can feel it, Miho. Give it a twist.
translation.zh: 我觉得他感觉不到 米霍 拧一拧

translation.en: You won't give with any more lip about staying here or Miho will have to...
translation.zh: 你别再说要留下来的话了 否则米霍就得把你…

translation.en: Exhale.
And that heart Molly worked so hard to fix will just pop like a grape.
translation.zh: 而莫莉千辛万苦拯救回来的心脏 也会像葡萄一样被捏碎

translation.en: He's staying.
And if you're going to kill him...
You'd better kill me, too.
Even though he doesn't feel the same way about me,
he's the only man I'll ever love.
They all seem to be waiting for the other shoe to drop.
translation.zh: 他们似乎都在等其他人动作

translation.en: Gail drops it.
It was dark in that alley, Miho,
when you were 15.
You killed three of the Tong.
GAIL: But the last two had the drop on you.
-You were dead. -(GUNSHOTS)
Until someone appeared.
You never got a good look at the man who saved you.
translation.zh: 你没看清救你的人是谁

translation.en: Take a look now.
DWIGHT: I get more time.
And more surgery.
Listen, there's only one person that has anything to gain from snuffing Damien Lord
translation.zh: 听着 只有一个人 能从达米安洛德的死中获利

translation.en: and you're too busy banging the broad to bring her in for questioning!
translation.zh: 而你却在忙着跟她鬼混 妨碍审讯进程

translation.en: You don't know her. You don't know anything about her.
translation.zh: 你不了解她 你根本不了解她

translation.en: And I'll be damned if I let you use that kind of language when you talk about her.
translation.zh: 你再这么说她 我就不客气了

translation.en: You're in love with her.
You stupid schmuck!
It's one thing to poke a babe on the side, but you can't even think straight!
translation.zh: 你跟她私下幽会是一回事 -但你现在简直无法思考了！ -闭嘴！

translation.en: Shut the hell up!
translation.zh: -但你现在简直无法思考了！ -闭嘴！

translation.en: I know what I'm doing.
I guess I should have told you everything.
translation.zh: 我想应该把一切都告诉你

translation.en: You're damn right you should've.
He raped me.
He almost killed me.
That son of a bitch.
I thought I could reason with him, but...
translation.zh: 我以为我能跟他讲道理 但是…

translation.en: He was worse than ever.
His hands at my throat,
strangling me while he did what he needed to do. -(ZIPPER UNZIPS) -(GRUNTS)
Not while I'm around!
He'll kill me, kill me, kill me!
I have only you. I love you, Mort. Keep me safe.
translation.zh: 我只有你了 我爱你 莫特 保护我

translation.en: -Keep me, keep me, keep me! -(PHONE RINGING)
-(MORT SIGHS) -Ava Lord.
For once you missed my heart.
I'm healing quickly, Ava.
translation.zh: 我恢复得很快 艾娃

translation.en: I'll be coming for you soon.
You know where he is and you won't do a damn thing about it.
translation.zh: 你明知道他在哪却什么都不做

translation.en: You don't know what you're asking.
translation.zh: 你不知道你在要求什么

translation.en: We have to wait for Old Town to give him up. It's the only way.
translation.zh: 我们得等老城的人把他放出来 这是唯一的办法

translation.en: You're a Sin City cop.
You've got a badge and a gun. You've got power.
translation.zh: 你拿着警徽配着枪 你有权力

translation.en: Use it.
If you ever want to have this woman again...
Be a man.
If you're a man...
Kill him.
Don't move.
McCarthy.
You never tortured her.
You two cooked that up.
-You were her lover. -You're a fool.
The Goddess takes no lover. The Goddess makes slaves of men.
translation.zh: 女神没有情人 男人只是她的奴隶

translation.en: In an instant she can see to the heart of you,
translation.zh: 她一下就能看透你的心

translation.en: and transform to your deepest desire.
translation.zh: 然后变成你内心最深处的渴望

translation.en: To Damien Lord, she was the princess bride.
translation.zh: 对达米安洛德来说 她是美丽的新娘

translation.en: To you, a damsel in distress.
translation.zh: 对你来说 她是患难的少女

translation.en: She devoured all of you.
You cannot defeat the Goddess.
She cannot die.
You're as crazy as she is.
If you were as rotten as her, I would blow your brains out right now.
translation.zh: 要是你也跟她一样烂 我现在会一枪崩了你

translation.en: But I'm trying to be careful about who I kill.
translation.zh: 但是我现在不轻易杀人

translation.en: And all you did was pound the crap outta me.
translation.zh: 你不过是揍了我一顿而已

translation.en: You've already paid an eye for that.
translation.zh: 已经付出一只眼睛的代价了

translation.en: I'm letting you go with a warning.
translation.zh: 我放你一马 但是警告你

translation.en: Stay in bed.
Don't go back to work.
And don't get in my way.
DWIGHT: No, Ava, you're no goddess.
translation.zh: 不 艾娃 你不是女神

translation.en: You're a witch.
A predator.
Maybe I only got what I deserved, but what about the others?
translation.zh: 也许我是罪有应得 但是其他人呢？

translation.en: Good men driven mad.
translation.zh: 好人都变得丧心病狂了

translation.en: BOB: You really lost it.
Bad enough you leave your wife for that skank.
translation.zh: 你最好别为了那个婊子抛弃妻子

translation.en: You watch what you call her, you son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 注意你的用词 狗娘养的

translation.en: You're throwing away your career.
Hell, you're committing suicide, you stupid shit!
translation.zh: 你是在自寻死路 蠢货

translation.en: I know what I'm doing. I'm going to Old Town.
translation.zh: 我知道我在干什么 我要去老城

translation.en: And I'm gonna nail this guy once and for all.
translation.zh: 我要彻底了结这个男人

translation.en: If I have to go it alone,
I will.
Do me a favour and turn the car around,
translation.zh: 帮我个忙 把车掉头

translation.en: and you go back to the station.
-You've gotta come clean with the Captain. -I'm a cop. I'm doing my job.
translation.zh: 你要跟局长讲清楚 我是个警察 在做自己的本职工作

translation.en: I'm hunting down a murderer.
-Look, you've gotta ditch that dame! -That's enough!
-We won't talk about Ava. -Somebody has gotta set you straight.
translation.zh: 别再说艾娃的事 有人会让你清醒的

translation.en: You've gotta forget about that stupid whore.
translation.zh: 你必须忘了那个臭婊子

translation.en: Turn the car around or I'm turning you in!
translation.zh: 掉头 否则我将逮捕你

translation.en: I warned you.
Every day I warned you!
But you keep asking for it and asking for it!
Well, here it is, pal!
Mort, no...
DWIGHT: A witch.
A predator.
Destroying lives.
Sometimes for power.
Sometimes for profit.
Sometimes for sport.
But now you're locked away in your mansion,
translation.zh: 但你现在被禁锢在这别墅里

translation.en: a bird of prey in a gilded cage.
Are you ready to do something stupid?
I'm so happy you chose to attend my little party, Herr Wallenquist.
translation.zh: 很高兴你选择光临我的聚会 沃伦奎斯特先生

translation.en: Your invitation surprised me, Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 你的邀请让我很意外 洛德夫人

translation.en: Your husband had no criminal associations.
translation.zh: 你的丈夫跟犯罪团伙毫无往来

translation.en: Believe me, I tried.
-May I speak truthfully, Mr Wallenquist? -Please.
translation.zh: -我能说实话吗 沃伦奎斯特先生？ -请讲

translation.en: Old Town is a thorn in your side.
Indeed it is.
All those profits, in the hands of whores.
translation.zh: 那群婊子获得那么多利益

translation.en: Surely you've wanted to put them in their place,
make some adjustment in the balance of power,
translation.zh: 做些调整 平衡一下权力

translation.en: show them who rules Sin City.
translation.zh: 让她们见识一下谁才是统治者

translation.en: You have limited influence on me, Mrs Lord.
translation.zh: 你的话对我不起作用 洛德夫人

translation.en: I haven't been doing so very badly.
But those two policemen, that was an embarrassing blunder.
translation.zh: 但那两个警察的事 还真是失策

translation.en: Yes.
I'm out of my league.
I need a stronger, more experienced hand.
translation.zh: 我需要更强大 更有经验的帮手

translation.en: I need Lord Enterprises joined in matrimony
with the expertise and iron fist of Alarich Wallenquist.
translation.zh: 和专业而强硬的沃伦奎斯特集团联姻

translation.en: What you need is the corpse of Dwight McCarthy
translation.zh: 你要的是德怀特·麦卡锡的尸体

translation.en: and a suicide note in which he confesses to the murder of Damien Lord.
translation.zh: 和他承认谋杀达米安洛德的一纸遗书

translation.en: And you need to show those Old Town bitches who's boss.
translation.zh: 而你要让那些老城的贱人们 知道谁才是老大

translation.en: Indeed I do.
WALLENQUIST: There is a specialist in Texas.
I can have him on a train tomorrow.
translation.zh: 我可以安排他明天乘火车来

translation.en: AVA: I'll brief him myself.
WALLENQUIST: He'll be on your doorstep at midnight.
AVA: And I'll be yours forever.
WALLENQUIST: Pray for your soul, Ava.
translation.zh: 为你的灵魂祈祷吧 艾娃

translation.en: This won't be its last visit to Sin City.
MANUTE: Good evening, Mr Campbell.
translation.zh: 晚上好 坎贝尔先生

translation.en: -I'll take your bag. -Nobody touches my gear.
And I've got somebody picking me up who's one hell of a lot cuter than you.
translation.zh: 而且我有人来接 那人可比你可爱多了

translation.en: It was our understanding that you would travel alone.
translation.zh: 我们还以为您是一个人来的

translation.en: I'm full of surprises.
Shuffle that booty over to the shotgun side, doll.
I'm driving.
-We'll follow you. -Mrs Lord may not be pleased.
translation.zh: -我们会跟着您 -洛德夫人可能会不太高兴

translation.en: She's the one with a problem. I can always get back on the train.
translation.zh: 她是有麻烦的人 我随时可以走人

translation.en: Wait here.
Hurry back.
You know I get impatient.
And you know I get a little crazy when I get impatient.
translation.zh: 你知道我没耐心时会有点疯狂

translation.en: Boogaard.
Watch this woman.
Jacoby.
If this man moves, kill him.
translation.zh: 如果他动一下 就杀了他

translation.en: I thought this was business.
My compliments to your surgeon, Mr McCarthy.
translation.zh: 手术做得很好啊 麦卡锡先生

translation.en: A remarkable transformation, but you still have the eyes.
translation.zh: 惊人的转变 但你的眼睛没变

translation.en: The eyes of a dead man.
I hate being left alone.
When I'm alone,
it makes me wanna do all kinds of crazy things.
translation.zh: 就会让我想做各种疯狂的事

translation.en: No woman should be left alone with a man like you.
translation.zh: 不该让女人跟你这种人独处

translation.en: Do you want me
to do something we shouldn't?
translation.zh: 做一些我们不该做的事吗？

translation.en: My lips are sealed.
There's something I need in the trunk.
translation.zh: 后备箱里有我需要的东西

translation.en: Bear witness.
MANUTE: Mrs Lord, the specialist has arrived.
translation.zh: 洛德夫人 专家到了

translation.en: DWIGHT: The bathing thing with her was never about bathing.
translation.zh: 对她来说 洗澡永远不是目的

translation.en: It was always theatre.
Or maybe it was retail.
You can't make a sale without showing the goods.
It's McCarthy.
AVA: Do you mind if I say that you're twice the man I thought you were?
translation.zh: 希望你不介意我说 你比我想的要像个男人？

translation.en: You're a warrior.
A killer.
You're everything I want out of a man, but I could never get the honesty out of you.
translation.zh: 你就是我想要的男人 但我永远没法让你说实

translation.en: You could have been everything I needed.
translation.zh: 你原本可以是我需要的一切

translation.en: You still could be.
You're a new man.
DWIGHT: Remember what she did.
Remember what she is.
Wait for your opening.
Wait for Gail to do her bit.
When you're immune to me, I'll let you know.
translation.zh: 当你能对我免疫的时候 我会告知你的

translation.en: Step back, mistress. Let me kill him.
translation.zh: 退后 夫人 让我杀了他

translation.en: Please...
Six shots and not a single head wound.
translation.zh: 六发子弹 没有一发打中头

translation.en: DWIGHT: Then it all gets down to speed and luck.
translation.zh: 现在就看速度和运气了

translation.en: Her eyes are wet and full of love.
translation.zh: 她的眼睛湿润 充满了爱

translation.en: I never dreamed.
You're everything I've ever wanted.
Everything I need.
You and me... Forever.
It's over.
Pain has set you free.
You're not good any more, Dwight.
translation.zh: 你不再是好人了 德怀特

translation.en: You're more like me. Be like me.
translation.zh: 你更像我了 跟我一样

translation.en: Let the old Dwight go, let it go with his old face.
translation.zh: 忘了过去的德怀特 忘了过去的面孔

translation.en: DWIGHT: She pulls close and I've got to look.
translation.zh: 她靠近我 我不得不看着

translation.en: And all I want is to be lost in the sight
translation.zh: 而我只想迷失在她的目光弯里

translation.en: and sound and smell of her.
I can't think straight.
We can be free. We can be happy.
translation.zh: 我们可以自由 可以快乐

translation.en: Together...
...forever.
No.
Her kiss is a promise of paradise.
Dwight.
The gun barks and bucks in my hand.
Life leaves Ava with a sigh.
translation.zh: 一声叹息 生命离开了艾娃

translation.en: Sirens climb the hill.
We'll take the back roads, the old bootlegger roads.
translation.zh: 我们会从小路逃走 以前运私酒的路

translation.en: They'll never catch us.
I'm going home.
JOHNNY: Walk down the right back alley in Sin City
translation.zh: 在罪恶之城的背街小巷走一走

translation.en: and you can find anything.
I was told I could find a man here by the name of Mr Kroenig.
translation.zh: 听说在这能找到一位克罗尼格先生

translation.en: That's Dr Kroenig to you.
Yes, sir.
Licence or no licence,
these hands still got what it takes.
translation.zh: 这双手仍然能做好一切

translation.en: Once I'm prepped.
How much you got?
40 bucks you got.
40 bucks' worth you get.
Steady as a rock...
...once I'm prepped.
40 bucks got you the bullet.
But that hand of yours...
That's a lot of bones need setting.
I'll give you an hour...
...for your shoes.
Take 'em.
I do my best to think about winning...
Revenge.
The old man must like popsicles. He uses the sticks for splints.
translation.zh: 那个老头肯定喜欢冰棍 拿来当夹板的木棍

translation.en: He licks them first.
Not so much as a goddamn thank you.
Generosity just don't count for shit this... day and age.
JOHNNY: Quite a job you did on me, Roark.
Even my shoes.
There's nothing more you could take.
Except...
Marcie.
The girl!
Oh, my Christ.
Marcie.
Oh, Marcie, you weren't a part of this.
You were just there to throw 'em off their game.
translation.zh: 找你只是为了让他们放松警惕

translation.en: What have I dragged you into?
This has turned into one long, bad night.
translation.zh: 今夜变得如此漫长难熬

translation.en: The window's not locked.
Never a good sign.
Not in Sin City.
ROARK: Look who decided to show up.
Give the man a hand.
Give the man another hand.
Ruined, penniless, friendless and forgotten.
translation.zh: 身败名裂 身无分文 没有朋友 被人遗忘

translation.en: You'd really be better off dead, Johnny.
translation.zh: 你真的还不如死了 钱宁

translation.en: But I like you just the way you are!
translation.zh: 但我就喜欢你这个样子

translation.en: I got cocky.
I got cocky and I got Marcie dead.
translation.zh: 我太自大了 结果害死了玛茜

translation.en: Damn it, Johnny.
Hate yourself when you've got the time.
Think about tonight's game.
That's all that matters now.
translation.zh: 那才是现在最重要的事

translation.en: And all you need is money.
Just one lousy buck would be enough to get you started.
translation.zh: 只要一块钱 就足够翻身了

translation.en: Hello, ma'am.
I don't have the money to pay, but could I ask you for a glass of water?
translation.zh: 我没钱付账 但我能要杯水吗？

translation.en: Yeah.
Times are tough all over.
Thank you.
WAITRESS: What's with the hand?
I beat the wrong guy at cards.
Tough break.
Thank you very much.
Just a second, you.
You don't stink of anything I don't like
and you kinda remind me of an old boyfriend, okay?
translation.zh: 让我有点想起我的前男友

translation.en: This won't take you very far.
Sweetheart...
It's gonna take me to the moon.
Sin City...
You never know.
Just don't spend it all in one place.
Hey, handsome. What you gonna do with all that?
translation.zh: 嘿 帅哥 你要用它做什么？

translation.en: I'm gonna kill Roark.
(CHUCKLES) The Roarks, they don't die that easy.
translation.zh: 罗克 可没那么容易死

translation.en: I just might surprise you.
Looks like something happened to your game hand, son.
translation.zh: 看起来你的幸运之手出事了 孩子

translation.en: I'll fold.
What's wrong, hotshot?
No good without that Lady Luck you brought the last time?
translation.zh: 上次的幸运女郎没来就不行了吗？

translation.en: I'll be fine.
LIEBOWITZ: I'm done. MAN: I'm out.
ROARK: I need three.
SYLVIO: Dealer takes two.
-ABDUL: Check. -Check.
I'll bet $100.
Shit.
Fold.
Just not the same without your game hand, is it?
translation.zh: 没有幸运之手就不一样了 是吧？

translation.en: I'm ambidextrous.
Cut.
-Check. -Check.
SYLVIO: I'm in.
I'll raise you...
$500 more.
-I'll fold. -I'm done.
I raise you $500 more, pretty boy.
translation.zh: 再加五百 漂亮小子

translation.en: You favour your mother. She was a whore.
translation.zh: 你喜欢你妈 她是个婊子

translation.en: And not a very good one.
She was an angel.
I'm all in.
For the works.
Call.
That's four aces.
See, I told you, I never lose.
translation.zh: 看 跟你说了 我不会输

translation.en: I beat you.
Twice.
That means I'm better than you are.
And everybody knows it.
Because I beat you again, every time somebody tells that story,
translation.zh: 每次有人讲起这个故事 我都会再打败你一次

translation.en: and they'll all say that they won't tell it, but they will.
translation.zh: 他们会说他们不会说 但他们会的

translation.en: That's the story that'll be told again and again until you're dead,
translation.zh: 会有人不断地讲起这个故事 直到你死去

translation.en: and long after you're dead.
I beat you forever.
Now they'll all know what happens when you do.
translation.zh: 他们也都知道打败我会发生什么

translation.en: Say hello to your mama.
She always was a stupid bitch.
ROARK: Power is as power does.
If I could give any young man advice, it would be this.
translation.zh: 如果要我给年轻人建议 就会是这一句

translation.en: Wear a rubber.
Now take out that trash. Let's get back to the game.
translation.zh: 把那垃圾丢出去 咱们接着玩

translation.en: NANCY: I can't lose you. Not again.
translation.zh: 我不能失去你了 我不能再次失去你

translation.en: You'll never lose me, Nancy.
translation.zh: 你从未失去我 南希

translation.en: LIEBOWITZ: All this time,
she was right there.
Dancing in the club where you play poker.
translation.zh: 在你玩牌的俱乐部里跳舞

translation.en: You've got to have been looking for a chance
to put this one through the ringer, Senator.
Nancy Callahan.
My son Ethan was killed because of her.
translation.zh: 我儿子伊森就是因她而死

translation.en: LIEBOWITZ: It's been four years now,
and still she's planting flowers at Hartigan's grave.
translation.zh: 她还是会去哈蒂根的墓前献花

translation.en: She's showing gratitude, from the looks of it, to the cop.
translation.zh: 她似乎在向那个警察表示谢意

translation.en: Gratitude to the cop,
who ripped your son to pieces.
translation.zh: 把你儿子大卸八块的警察

translation.en: ROARK: Hartigan turned my son into a freak.
translation.zh: 哈蒂根把我儿子变成了一个怪物

translation.en: Well,
completed him as a freak.
But I can hardly blame the young lady for...
-Obsession? -(CHUCKLES)
Just let the little fluff drown in her sorrow.
translation.zh: 不过是几分无用的哀悼罢了

translation.en: It might not be that simple.
Somehow, she got her hands on Hartigan's old pistol.
translation.zh: 她不知如何拿到了哈蒂根的枪

translation.en: LIEBOWITZ: She hits the range every night just before work.
translation.zh: 她每晚开工前都会去射击场

translation.en: -She's become quite a good shot. -(BULLETS CLINKING)
And I can only imagine whose face she sees on that target.
translation.zh: 我可以想象她把靶子想象成谁

translation.en: I'm listening.
She's been acting kind of crazy sometimes at work.
translation.zh: 她有时候上班时好像疯了一样

translation.en: She's drinking. Just in the past few weeks.
translation.zh: 她还喝酒 最近几周才开始

translation.en: She never drank before.
It's all like she's building up to something,
maybe building her nerve.
translation.zh: 也许是在积累她的勇气

translation.en: That'll be all, Lieutenant.
This little bitch is turning me on.
translation.zh: 这小婊子简直要让我勃起了

translation.en: NANCY: This place stinks.
I never used to notice.
Not when I danced.
But now I smell everything.
I see it all.
Every damn thing.
I know exactly where I am.
I know exactly what I am.
I don't use the stripper logic any more.
translation.zh: 我不再用脱衣舞娘的逻辑去思考了

translation.en: That they're losers and I'm not.
translation.zh: 不再觉得他们都是废物而我不是

translation.en: It was when I couldn't shoot him that I realised I was dead.
translation.zh: 当我可以朝他开枪时 我意识到我死定了

translation.en: That I wasn't a woman with a plan.
translation.zh: 我不是个胸有成竹的女人

translation.en: I was just a drunk.
I give them what they want.
Then I get the hell out of there.
ACTOR ON TV: Are you still there, Sam?
ACTOR 2: He shot me in the gut.
It wasn't me, Sam.
It was the babe.
This rotten town.
It soils everybody it touches.
This rotten town.
Those it can't corrupt, it soils.
translation.zh: 却无法腐蚀地下的土壤

translation.en: It soiled you, John Hartigan.
translation.zh: 那是你成长的土壤 约翰哈蒂根

translation.en: Put that bottle down, Nancy.
You've had enough.
It made you lie to me.
You're not even here right now.
You said you'd never leave me.
I've never left you.
I never will.
Never.
You're not even here right now.
You're dead.
You blew your brains out.
You stuck your gun in your mouth
and you blew your brains out.
I had my reasons.
-There was no way out. -I hate you!
translation.zh: 没有其他的选择 我恨你！

translation.en: You swore you'd always love me.
And I always will.
HARTIGAN: No one has ever really guessed what hell is.
translation.zh: 没人能猜到地狱是什么样子

translation.en: It's watching the people you love...
...in pain.
You're the only man I ever loved.
And you left me alone.
NANCY: You never thought we'd stand a chance against goddamn Senator Roark.
translation.zh: 你从不认为 我们能对抗罗克 （凶手 时间太长）

translation.en: You didn't believe in me.
You didn't think a little piece of ass like me
translation.zh: 你不相信像我这样的小丑

translation.en: could take down the most powerful man in the state.
translation.zh: 可以打败全州最有权势的人

translation.en: (LAUGHING)
Maybe I'll prove both of you wrong.
translation.zh: 也许我会证明你们俩都错了

translation.en: Or maybe I'll go crazy.
Crazy is sounding pretty good right now.
translation.zh: 现在发疯听起来挺好的

translation.en: I love you, Nancy.
ROARK: You little slut.
You're gonna scream before you die.
You're out of your mind.
I appreciate
the obsession,
but you've got nothing.
You could have killed me 50 times if you had the nerve.
translation.zh: 你要是有胆子 都能杀我50次了

translation.en: But you don't.
You are nothing.
(INHALES) You'll scream
just like my boy wanted you to.
translation.zh: 就像我儿子想要你做得那样

translation.en: Darling, where have you been?
translation.zh: 宝贝儿 你去哪儿了？

translation.en: And what have you done to your beautiful hair?
translation.zh: 你把你的一头秀发怎么了？

translation.en: Don't worry. Those bastards will get what they want.
translation.zh: 别担心 那些混蛋会得到他们想要的

translation.en: They always get what they want.
translation.zh: 他们总会得到他们想要的

translation.en: This is great! This...
What's up with you?
Something's wrong.
I'm outta here.
It's like watching my sister do the nasty.
translation.zh: 简直像眼看着我妹妹自甘堕落

translation.en: I'm taking a hike.
Pretty.
You're beautiful, Nancy.
HARTIGAN: Don't do this to yourself.
Pretty, pretty, pretty.
If a man did that to you, I'd tear him to pieces.
translation.zh: 如果有男人这么对你 我一定撕了他

translation.en: Lieutenant Hartigan... You just gave me a great idea.
translation.zh: 哈蒂根警长… 你给了我个好主意

translation.en: No, baby. Nancy...
Just give me a damn name.
Roark.
We're up against a lot. We'll need tools.
translation.zh: 我们要对抗很多东西 我们需要工具

translation.en: Looks like trouble.
-(GUNS COCKING) -MARV: No.
Looks like Christmas.
-Well, you missed last call, boys. -Bullshit.
translation.zh: 你们错过了最后一轮 孩子们 废话

translation.en: We're ripping this place a new asshole.
translation.zh: 我们是来打劫的 混蛋

translation.en: BIKER: Move or die.
I hope you don't me saying this, but...
translation.zh: 希望你不介意我这么说 但是…

translation.en: You look hot.
There's no reason to leave anybody alive. Nobody's innocent.
translation.zh: 没必要留活口 没人是无辜的

translation.en: And we can't leave anybody able to talk.
Don't go soft on me, kid. Don't leave anybody breathing.
translation.zh: 别心软 不留一个活口

translation.en: I won't.
I'll work the perimeter and nail the guards.
Baby, you're a natural.
I'll work the inside.
How will I know when you're in?
You'll have a pretty good idea.
MARV: Damn thing misfired on me.
I nearly got them all.
But this piece of shit jammed up on me.
Piece of crap Uzi...had to get all stuck.
Here.
Take a seat.
You're a peach.
I got this.
You clever, clever little whore.
I can't believe you made it this far.
translation.zh: 想不到你居然能走到这么远

translation.en: You know, Hartigan blew my son's pecker off.
translation.zh: 你的哈蒂根把我儿子的命根子断了

translation.en: So,
where shall I shoot you next?
translation.zh: 我接下来应该朝哪里开枪呢？

translation.en: That tight little belly of yours?
I'm holding a gun on you, young lady!
translation.zh: 我拿枪对着你呢 小姐

translation.en: The rules are, you pretend there's a chance that I won't shoot you.
translation.zh: 规矩是你要求饶 假装我也许不会开枪

translation.en: I told you, you would scream before you die.
translation.zh: 我说过 你死前会尖叫

translation.en: I owe it to my son.
Frankly, between you and me,
I've finally accepted that Ethan was not...
translation.zh: 我终于接受了伊森不是…

translation.en: Presidential material.
I'd have had a hard time buying him an election in an insane asylum.
translation.zh: 在精神病院拉选票真是太难了

translation.en: But he was my son, honey.
He was my son.
And now...
He's gonna hear you scream.
Scream.
This is for John Hartigan,
fucker.
NANCY: This rotten town.
It soils everybody.
